title: Code in Your Native Tongue: Amazon Q Developer Goes Global
author: Darryl K Taft
description: AWS breaks language barriers with Amazon Q Developer's multilingual support, enabling global developers to code in their native tongue.
cntitle: 用你的母语编程：Amazon Q Developer 走向全球
cndescription: AWS 通过 Amazon Q Developer 的多语言支持打破了语言障碍，使全球开发人员能够使用他们的母语进行编码。
